import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function Test11() { const [formvalue , setformvalue]=(useState({ firstname:"", lastename:"", ans:"" , checkbox:false })) const [submittedData, setSubmittedData] = useState(null); const displaysubmit=(e)=>{ const currentTarget = e.currentTarget const id= currentTarget.id console.log("ffffffffff" , id) let value = undefined switch(currentTarget.type) { case 'text': value=currentTarget.value break ; case "checkbox" : value = currentTarget.checked } setformvalue((preventstate)=>{ return {...preventstate , ...{[id]:value} } }) console.log("ddddd",formvalue) } const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() setSubmittedData(formvalue) } return ( <> {JSON.stringify(formvalue)}
{submittedData && (
Firstname Lastename Age Checkbox
{submittedData.firstname} {submittedData.lastename} {submittedData.ans} {submittedData.checkbox ? "Checked" : "Unchecked"}
)} ); }
